orderQuery: select ord.*,cu.name,cu.mobile,cod.outlet_name,cod.contactno from ck_orders ord join (select loginid,name,mobile from ck_user) cu ON ord.supplierid=cu.loginid join (select outletcode,outlet_name,contactno from ck_outlet_details) cod ON ord.outletcode= cod.outletcode where  ord.order_number in (select id from orderx_numbers) order by {DYNAMIC_SORT}
orderIdQuery: insert into orderx_numbers select order_number, status from ck_orders ord {where_block}  {DYNAMIC_FILTER} {hierarchy_condition} order by {DYNAMIC_SORT}  limit {DYNAMIC_LIMIT}
minimalOrderQuery: select ord.id, ord.beat, ord.normalized_quantity, ord.extended_attributes, ord.outletcode, ord.loginid, ord.source, ord.net_amount, ord.creation_time, ord.order_number, ord.outletcode, ord.supplierid, ord.status, ord.type, cu.name, cu.mobile, cod.outlet_name, cod.contactno from ck_orders ord join (select loginid, name, mobile from ck_user) cu on ord.supplierid = cu.loginid join (select outletcode, outlet_name, contactno from ck_outlet_details) cod on ord.outletcode = cod.outletcode where ord.order_number in (select id from orderx_numbers) order by {DYNAMIC_SORT}
orderDetailsQuery: select ods.* from ck_order_details ods where ods.order_id in ({order_ids})
orderHistoryQuery: select coh.* from ck_order_history coh where coh.order_id in ({order_ids})
minimalOrderIdQuery: insert into orderx_numbers select order_number, status from ck_orders ord {where_block}  {DYNAMIC_FILTER} {hierarchy_condition} order by {DYNAMIC_SORT}  limit {DYNAMIC_LIMIT}
minimalOrderDetailsQuery: select ods.order_id, ods.type, ods.batch_code, ods.case_quantity, ods.piece_quantity, ods.other_unit_quantity from ck_order_details ods where ods.order_id in ({order_ids})
minimalOrderHistoryQuery: select coh.creation_time, coh.status, coh.order_id from ck_order_history coh where coh.order_id in ({order_ids})
